message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product that I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $12000. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $10000 for it.
Bob, I understand your position, but $10000 doesn't quite cover my costs. How about we split the difference? I'm willing to accept $11000 for the product.  Let's make this deal happen!
